div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2150 Canicattini, 20 km. W of Syracuse, (745) 1917 Burial: c. 300 B.C. (K) Contents: 19+ AR Syracuse: 1 tetradr. (Agathocles, quadr.) Pegasi Corinth: 16 (Ravel, Period V to ΑΡ, Α, Γ, Ι, ΔΙ ) Leucas: 2 (amphora, stylis) Disposition: Syracuse Currò Pisanò, AIIN 1962-4, p. 225 This hd. appears to be the same as that recorded by Noe from Noto 1916 (no. 745) on the authority of P. Orsi
